content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one of the requests Juno makes concerning the Latins in lines 5-7 (ne...vestem).

frqParts.text: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one of the requests Juno makes concerning the Latins in lines 5-7 (ne...vestem).

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
